text: A little side note re. Bundestag Inquiry into NSA:
Johannes Eisenberg, a (former?) lawyer of WL, served as legal adviser for seven witnesses, all from BND, incl. General Breitfelder.
Of course, everyone has the right to legal assistance.
But obviously, Eisenberg is a contractor of the BND. That doesn’t make him necessarily trustworthy.
First of all, the documents show how all concerned parties systematically try to block the work of the inquiry commission.
The witnesses from BND and Telekom “can’t remember”, “was not responsible”, “do not know” and so on
For instance, the former CEO of Telekom, Kai-Uwe Ricke, had a four-eyes-meeting with the chief of the BND…
…but can’t remember what they’ve been talking about
The newspaper article you mentioned, “Kauder and Maaßen criticize WikiLeaks”, comes from the “Welt”, a very conservative newspaper
Volker Kauder (CDU parliamentary leader) is a conservative hardliner.Hans-Georg Maaßen is the chief of Germany’s domestic secret service BfV
Kauder criticizes that the WL release “might threaten the cooperation of German secret services with the NSA”
(hopefully, he’s right)
Great find, Emmy! Imho, we can tweet it. It’s archived and several witnesses have seen it. It doesn’t matter whether he deletes the tweets
Grmpf, ok. 3 days left until court decision…
Very good, Emmy! This is evidence for both, the forum and the twitter acc. The forum post is still online with his name on the screenshots
Jenny : “Catch him by surprise in court” doesn’t work out in Germany. All evidence has to be presented to the court in advance 🙁
Emmy: No, the screenshots at FWLF are not cropped, his name is clearly visible.. Note the scrollbar at the bottom..

Emmy: Yes, captured on archive.is and wayback machine, both with working scrollbar https://archive.is/pq4qKhttp://web.archive.org/web/20150520123726/http://www.wikileaks-forum.com/atgreekemmy-aka-emilia-butlin/634/the-weird-world-of-assange-groupie-humor/33797/
I’ve just received a new preliminary injunction, for this tweet: https://archive.is/Qbu99
I’ve removed this tweet 3 day later by request of [MGT]’s lawyer.
I have no idea why they seek a preliminary injunction, in spite of the fact that the concerned tweet has already been removed
Today’s court decision in my case has been postponed until tomorrow for technical reasons
There has been a “fairly final” decision in PC’s case, but I don’t know any details yet
Bad news: As it seems, the court has rejected PC’s claim
WL: The court didn’t explain the decision in any way. We have to wait for the written reasons for the judgment
PC intends to appeal against the judgement by all means
I still don’t have a court decision. The clerk’s office of the court was closed today for unknown reasons.
Monday is a bank holiday in Germany, so we have to wait until Tuesday
WL: If I win, MGT has to pay my lawyer and the court costs, all in all approx. 3000 Euros, plus his own lawyer
That message is not part of the website but part of the URL, harmless crap. Example: http://tinyurl.com/py8vkcd
The Frankfurt district court has annulled the preliminary injunction concerning the publication of [MGT]’s photo 🙂
The court seems to be completely overloaded. I still have to wait for the written reasons for the judgment “for one or two weeks”
No. MGT has to pay the court fees and the lawyers, since he lost
But I’m afraid that he has a legal protection insurance, in contrast to me
It’s 3 bills, one from the court and 2 from the lawyers. My lawyer already sent his bill to MGT today
I don’t know. Legal protection insurance is expensive. I guess, that he concluded an insurance after the PC case started
hmm, that’s a very long way, could take years
yes, that’s why he sued me for the recent publications of his photo but ignored the publications of last year
Just for the records: MGT only lost the preliminary injunction now. The principal proceedings in this case goes on trial in October
WL: It’s just an assumption that MGT has a legal insurance. I have no idea which one it might be.
“The Magic of Fresh Content on your Web Site” by Mark [GT], Feb 2007 🙂 http://ezinearticles.com/?The-Magic-of-Fresh-Content-on-your-Web-Site&id=465900
hazel: Has Twitter notified you in any way or has the tweet just disappeared?
Strange! Twitter didn’t ask me to remove my tweets, they are still online. Due to the court decision there is no legal reason to remove them
I’ve just received the written reasons for the judgement on the annulment of the injunction. It says almost nothing.
A preliminary injunction requires urgency and the only reason for the annulment is the lack of urgency in this case.
The court has neither judged whether the publication of his photo is a violation of MGT’s rights nor whether he is responsible for FWLF.
This judgements are deferred until the principal proceedings in October.
MGT falsely claimed that he wasn’t aware of the publication of his photo before January 2015.
He forgot that he demanded the removal of this photo already in April 2014, by written letter.
This is the ONLY reason why the court has annulled the injunction.
PC’s case: I have no update yet. She is still waiting for the written reasons of judgement.
bing, bing, bing: 50% reached https://wikileaks.org/pledge/
[Tweet] https://twitter.com/Cabledrummer/status/608281232150011904 I’ve just learned that in fact there has been a whistleblowing article in the German law, from 1951 until 1968
It roughly stated: When a member of the German parliament reveals a state secret to the public, this is not an illegal act …
… provided that he intends to prevent a breach of a constitutional law this way
(Sadly, my English is insufficient for an accurate translation.)
Yes it got deleted in 1968
It has been mentioned by Mr. Foschepoth at the “Digital Surveillance State” event on Sunday
hazel: In 1968, the German Emergency Acts (“Notstandsgesetze”) took place http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_Emergency_Acts
WL: There’s a problem with the domain registrar of http://freeassangenow.org
The registry for the TLD .org (afilias-nst) does not deliver an authoritative DNS for http://freeassangenow.org
Wikileaks: http://freeassangenow.org
Standard DNS lookup terminates with “Domain does not exist” https://www.renderland.net/dns/?q=freeassangenow.org
Whois looks ok, name server points to ns*.wikileaks.org http://www.whois.com/whois/freeassangenow.org
Direct DNS lookup at ns*.wikileaks.org works out https://www.renderland.net/dns/?q=freeassangenow.org&ns=ns1.wikileaks.org&mode=2
No, it looks like a technical problem of their domain registrar
@smsteinitz is back on Twitter
http://freeassangenow.org
At least, the name of MGT’s lawyer is public now: Dr. Severin Müller-Riemenschneider @RA_Medienrecht
Poll: Who of us is blocked by @smsteinitz? Is anyone blocked by @smsteinitz without prior interaction?
[Tweet] https://twitter.com/Cabledrummer/status/613018469588672512 I’ve published a piece on @smsteinitz, in German. Let’s see how quick the lawyers of “Stern” are …
I’m very sorry but I’m unable to translate this piece into English
I’ve found someone who translates it into English until tomorrow
Indeed strange, site down since Monday
Emmy: There is no content atm, http://wikileaks-press.org
English translation of my article on Steinitz: https://www.cabledrum.net/docs/steinitz_en.pdf
FWLF was so kind to translate the Stern articles: http://www.wikileaks-forum.com/index.php?topic=33990http://www.wikileaks-forum.com/index.php?topic=33990
My lawyer informed me that the court fees for MGT’s lost injunction have been paid by a legal expense insurance
Today, we have filed criminal complaint against MGT for perjury.
(It took a while because our lawyer is very busy. The complete complaint consists of 60 pages.)
[Tweet] https://twitter.com/Cabledrummer/status/619438445262454784 The text about the first German whistleblower protection law is available in English now
In the court case of MGT against me regarding his photo, the pronouncement of judgement is postponed until tomorrow.
Meanwhile, the provider of the forum server, OVH SAS, has been forced by a french court to reveal its customer’s identity.
According to OVH, the server of FWLF is owned by MGT’s wife, [redacted].
As a result, the criminal investigations against MGT have been reopened.
It takes a long time but we will get him 🙂
MGT vs. me: I still do not know the court decision because the court clerk’s office was closed today for unknown reasons. Hence we have to wait until Monday.
Yes, German civil servants avoid working on Fridays
Bad news: MGT has won the court case concerning the publication of his photo.
The court found that I’m not allowed to publish his photo, even if he published it himself and even if he still is responsible for the forum.
The judge was the same who has judged in favour of MGT in the case of PC vs. MGT.
I intend to appeal, but I have to check if I can finance it.
The court found that MGT is not a “person of public interest” and thus the publication of his photo violates his privacy rights
New Statement from Marianne Ny: “Marianne Ny does not give interviews.” http://news.cision.com/aklagarmyndigheten/r/report-on-the-assange-case,c9910645
She is “CURRENTLY working on a renewed request to interview Julian Assange at Ecuador’s embassy in London”
The closure of @wikileaks_forum is a very strange development. I have no idea what the reason for it could be. I can’t imagine that MGT would ever give up this Twitter account voluntarily.
FWLF have reduced their activities on FB substantially in the past years. They only did approx. 300 FB posts last year, in contrast to more than 30,000 tweets.
MGT still has a number of FB pages but most of them seem to be abandoned. Beside https://www.facebook.com/wikileaksforumhttps://www.facebook.com/WikiLeaks.SunshinePress
FWLF announced to concentrate on FB but they didn’t post anything on FB today. Also, there are only 2 forum posts today (average is approx. 40). Something serious is going on there
I’ve just rechecked the real IP address of the FWLF server (hidden behind Cloudflare). The real IP still is 188.165.249.110, hosted by OVH in France, owned by MGT’s wife [redacted].
There are ZERO new admin posts on FWLF since 5 days. (Average is approx. 40 posts per day.) As a solution, they have now removed the usage statistics. Really strange…
I doubt that it has anything to do with the court case. The court hearing (PC vs. MGT) took place 4 weeks ago. Whatever happens now, can not influence the ruling anymore.
[Tweet] https://twitter.com/hacker_center/status/709992661227347968 Does anybody know something about it? https://twitter.com/hacker_center/status/710852297245528064
hmm, unimportant old stuff
Sharpe just seems to be someone who was in contact with MGT regarding the tinnitus stuff several years ago.
Emmy: Thank you very much for your support!!!
The court hearing (me vs. MGT at OLG Frankfurt) takes place on 21 Apr
Meanwhile, I got a written pleading from MGT’s lawyer, regarding the criminal charge against MGT for perjury. This at least means that the public prosecutor has started an investigation against him.

We’ve filed the complaint in July 2015, after he lied under oath in the injunction case against me. MGT claimed that he is not responsible for http://wikileaksforum.comhttp://support-julian-assange.comhttp://wikileaksforum.comhttp://support-julian-assange.com
My court hearing against MGT takes place today at the Higher District Court in Frankfurt.
Thanks! I really hope that this is the end of the MGT nightmare.
The court hearing is over. The court didn’t give any hint. So we have to wait for the judgement (in a week or two)
http://wikileaks-press.org
WUA: No. The court didn’t give any hint (as usual). Now, the court could decide to convene another hearing (which is unlikely) or they can make the judgment. We have to wait…
The prosecutor has terminated the proceedings against MGT for perjury. We will contest this decision at the Prosecutor General.
This is the third criminal investigation against MGT that has been terminated without charge, despite clear evidence. Obviously, MGT enjoys some “special protection”.
Yes, it makes me wonder. Obviously, my notion of the independence of the German judiciary is somewhat too utopian
I have finally lost the court case against MGT. The judgement cannot be appealed.
This means that it is illegal under German law to use the photo of MGT. I have to remove the photo from my server immediately.
Also it means that I have to pay approx. 18000 Euros (which I do not have).
I don’t know any further details yet (I have to wait for the written judgement) but it smells very fishy. Even my lawyer says that he “doesn’t understand the world anymore.”
MGT has won both cases against PC and against me. 3 criminal complaints against him failed, despite clear evidence.
This is extremely frustrating. All attempts to stop MGT’s illegal actions have failed.
I lost in Nov 2015 before LG Frankfurt (regional court) and now (21 Apr) before OLG Frankfurt (higher court).
The court ruled that the verdict cannot be appealed before the Federal Supreme Court (“BGH”).
“doesn’t understand the world anymore.” — No, not a bad lawyer but a *very* strange and unexpected decision of the court.
Along with PC’s case and the discontinued criminal proceedings it simply seems to be perversion of justice

Similar to media censorship, I really would like to understand how it actually works. Do the judges decide on their own because they are biased against anything with the “WikiLeaks” label? Do they believe to do the right thing, even by violating the law? Or has someone from the ministry of the interior “recommended” how the judgement should look like?
Twitter has unsuspended @Godlike_Tyrant (for the moment)
Christine Sands again: http://sofiawilen.com/https://twitter.com/USAF_m_cetera/status/742721293108281344

After the prosecutor terminated the proceedings against MGT for perjury, we have lodged a complaint against this decision at the Prosecutor General. Now, the Prosecutor General has rejected our complaint.
Key point: In the eyes of the prosecutor, perjury is not punishable, as long as it doesn’t affect the judgement.
[Media-image] https://ton.twitter.com/1.1/ton/data/dm/743088219449925635/743088219483471880/VzQRmhiR.jpg @Godlike_Tyrant got suspended again, for this tweet
